Name: The Fantastic Adventure of Monsieur Grape
About the game: The Fantastic Adventure of Monsieur Grape is a 2.5D platformer where you play as Monsieur Grape: A high brow, high class, grape who is trying to save his friend Peanut from an evil piece of bread! This game is a passion project designed to pay homage to popular platformers while scaling down graphics to enable playing on mobile devices.
